Whats On Tap
We've got a slew of elixirs flowing from our taps that will tantalize your tastebuds and quench your thirst for fine ales! Growlers are being filled as well, but please call ahead to make sure we're pouring what your craving on the day of your visit. We've also got a great selection of bottled beers available for your enjoyment! Come and see what's happening down at the Artifactory!

Wondering what thirst quenching nectars you'll find today at the Artifactory? Join us at our home on Bartlett Bay Road where your joy is our delight! See below what you'll find on tap this week at the Artifactory.
